title: New urbanism and mixed use developmen

content.question: Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline each answer.In the last half of the twentieth century some United States cities experienced decline due to deindustrialization and loss of population due to suburbanization. To counteract the inner city decline, urban planners have embraced New Urbanism and mixed-use development to attract residents back to the city.Identify TWO goals of the New Urbanism movement.Explain the difference between mixed-use development and traditional zoning practices.Explain TWO benefits of mixed-use development in promoting urban growth.Explain TWO criticisms of New Urbanism.

frqParts.text: Directions: You have 25 minutes to answer the following question. It is suggested that you take up to 5 minutes of this time to plan and outline each answer.In the last half of the twentieth century some United States cities experienced decline due to deindustrialization and loss of population due to suburbanization. To counteract the inner city decline, urban planners have embraced New Urbanism and mixed-use development to attract residents back to the city.Identify TWO goals of the New Urbanism movement.Explain the difference between mixed-use development and traditional zoning practices.Explain TWO benefits of mixed-use development in promoting urban growth.Explain TWO criticisms of New Urbanism.

unit.text: 6: Cities and Urban Land-Use Patterns and Processes

skill.text: Skill 1.A: Describe geographic concepts, processes, models, and theories.
